#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		map<ll,ll> m;
		ll i,n,num,temp,max=0;
		cin>>n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>num;
			m[num]++;
		}
		map<ll,ll>::iterator start,last;
		start=m.begin();
		last=m.end();
		while(start!=last)
		{
			temp=start->second;
			if(temp>max)
			max=temp;
			start++;
		}
		cout<<max-1<<endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
